text: Gregor Miguel Blanco Pedraza (born December 24, 1983Tommy Bennett; Colin Wyers; et al, Baseball Prospectus 2011 : The Essential Guide To The 2011 Baseball Season (Hoboken, NJ: Wiley, 2011), p. 220) is a Venezuelan professional baseball player. He is an outfielder for the Arizona Diamondbacks. ==Career== Gregor Blanco was the center fielder and leadoff hitter for Tiburones de La Guaira in Venezuela. He hit .315 (178 AB) in the 2006â€“07 season. In the 2007-2008 season, he hit .345 (229 AB). In the 2008-2009 season, he hit .349. He eventually was sent to the majors because of Jordan Schafer's struggles. == References == Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:San Francisco Giants players Category:Atlanta Braves players Category:Kansas City Royals players
title: Gregor Blanco
